title: Ragi Dosa| Finger Millet Dosa| Instant Ragi Dosa/ crepe 😍| Breakfast
content:
Breakfast Recipe: South Indian breakfast : Instant Ragi Dosa Servings: 6 Dosa Duration: 20 mins Finger Millet is good for health and flour too, I previously shared recipe with finger millet flour/ Ragi flour the link available at the end of post. Today I prepared a healthy, quick and crispy South Indian breakfast recipe is Instant Ragi Dosa. It is delicious and lovely thin crepe, I hope you like it Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Ragi / Finger Millet flour - 160 gms
  • Rice flour - 80 gms
  • Sooji/ Semolina - 40 gms
  • Onion - 1 medium - finely chopped
  • Carrot 🥕 - Grated - 4 tb sp
  • Cilantro - handful - finely chopped
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Green chilly - 1 - finely chopped
  • Ginger - 1 tb sp - finely chopped
  • Cumin seeds - 1 tsp
  • Curry leaves - 8-10
  • Oil - to cook dosa
Procedure:
  • Add all ingredients in a mixing bowl except oil ☺️
  • Mix well, add water(400 ml) little by little and mix completely with out any lumps
  • Batter should be pouring consistency
  • Rest 10 mins ( Meanwhile prepare chutney)
  • Heat dosa tawa over medium to high heat
  • Sprinkle water and wipe off with onion/ paper towel
  • Pour batter all over Dosa tawa ( you should not spread like normal Dosa )
  • Apply oil and cook till it release from tawa
  • Flip and cook the other side
  • Serve hot with your chutney or Peanut Chutney
  • Happy Cooking 👩🏻‍🍳 & Enjoy your day ☀️
Step by step process shown below with pictures : Note:
  • Adjust spicy and salt according to taste
  • It's best to finish batter immediately, don't preserve more than a day because it's become so soft and can't make Dosa out of it
  • Double the quantity to make more Dosa's
  • Serve warm or hot immediately
